document_data.name: Dreylil Andrus
document_data.mainbody:
'''Dreylil Andrus''' was captain of the palace guard of King [[Yarin Frostmantle]] of the [[Damara]] ''circa'' [[1484 DR]].

Following the assassination of King Frostmantle, he worked with Court Wizard [[Red Mazzie]] to deflect suspicion from Queen [[Concettina Delcasio]] in order to ensure a peaceful transition to her rule.<ref>{{Cite digital book/Hero/Nook| |27}}
